alert.note: Alert for Coastal McIntosh; Inland McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MCINTOSH AND LONG COUNTIES... At 643 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Cox, or 8 miles south of Tibet, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...up to penny sized hail. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to plants, trees and crops is possible. Damage to windshields is unlikely. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Tibet, Jones, Townsend, Crescent, Eulonia, Pine Harbor, Valona, and Cox. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<45 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
